summary: Just to get you started with Wrye Bash
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=yellow]Just to get you started with Wrye bash
[/color][/size]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85782-0-1501862390.png[/img]


[size=4][color=green]by Alt3rn1ty
[/color][/size]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/133263-1378158978.gif[/img]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTE : This is a work in progress - For now you all may aswell be using the Basics and Intro to Installers file.

The Installers Advanced file, and Complete pngs, will come later when they are all finished.

Also note the mods used as examples in this Generic guide were Oblivion game mods, there are currently
more options for that game (such as patchers), until Wrye Bash is more developed for the newer
supported games (Skyrim LE / Fallout 4 / Skyrim SE) .. So do not expect all options / menus to
be the same as depicted in the images for all games. When patchers are developed specifically
for the newer games, I may well do more tailored guides per game instead of a one-size doesn't quite fit all.


[size=4][color=lightblue]
[/color][/size][size=4][color=lightblue]After installing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/?]Wrye Bash[/url], I recommend also installing [url=http://loot.github.io/]LOOT[/url] - Wrye Bash and Load Ordering are essential.[/color][/size][/center][center][size=4]
[color=yellow]Download the pdf files[/color][color=lightblue] (in the files tab) to view off-line at the same time as using Wrye Bash, and flip between the two - Requires a pdf reader, an open source variety here [url=http://www.sumatrapdfreader.org/free-pdf-reader.html]Sumatra PDF reader[/url] - does what you need a PDF reader to do.[/color]


[color=yellow]WBPG - Basics and Installers Intro pdf[/color][color=lightblue] - Basics to get you up and running with Wrye Bash - The Intro to Installers section of this guide details using previously made Bain Friendly/Ready Installers[/color]

[color=yellow]WBPG - Installers Advanced pdf[/color][color=lightblue] - For a more in-depth look at BAINs[/color]


[color=yellow]Wrye Bash Pictorial Guide Complete PNGs[/color][color=lightblue] - This file contains All images in PNG format from all pdf's; For those who may prefer to browse the guide using Windows Picture and Fax Viewer.
[/color][color=lightblue]

If you dont have 7zip for creating BAINs ... [url=http://www.7-zip.org/]7-zip[/url]

Mertz (A.K.A Beermotor) Has started creating a lot of wizards / bcf's recently for Mods which are not entirely Wrye Bash friendly, and needed a little scripting love - [url=https://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/topic/4987-relz-mertzs-wizbain-thread/]Mertz WizBAIN thread[/url].

Hopefully, this guide will help some of you to get past the initial information overload barrier that is the Wrye Bash.html help file, and get on with modding/playing a far more stable game setup ... Chow for now :)[/color][/size]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
Wrye Bash SLE
author: alt3rn1ty
